Package org.zaproxy.zap.control

Class AddOnClassLoader

java.lang.Object
java.lang.ClassLoader
java.security.SecureClassLoader
java.net.URLClassLoader
org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOnClassLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class AddOnClassLoader extends URLClassLoader
A URLClassLoader that search for classes and resources (first) in a given add-on file (URL). If a class or resource is not found, in the add-on file, the loading is delegated to the parent class loader. If not found in the parent class loader it will be searched in the dependencies (add-ons), if any.
See Also:
  • URLClassLoader

  • Constructor Details

    • AddOnClassLoader

      public AddOnClassLoader(URL addOnFileUrl, ClassLoader parent)
      Constructs a new AddOnClassLoader without dependencies on other add-ons.
      Parameters:
      addOnFileUrl - the URL to the add-on file that will be (first) used to load classes and resources
      parent - the parent class loader for delegation
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the addOnFileUrl or parent is null.

    • AddOnClassLoader

      public AddOnClassLoader(URL addOnFileUrl, ClassLoader parent, org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOnClassnames addOnClassnames)
      Constructs a new AddOnClassLoader without dependencies on other add-ons. Possibly restricting or allowing the loading of the given addOnClassnames, directly from this AddOnClassLoader.
      Parameters:
      addOnFileUrl - the URL to the add-on file that will be (first) used to load classes and resources
      parent - the parent class loader for delegation
      addOnClassnames - the classnames that can be loaded
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the addOnFileUrl or parent is null.
      Since:
      2.4.3

    • AddOnClassLoader

      public AddOnClassLoader(URL addOnFileUrl, AddOnLoader parent, org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOnClassnames addOnClassnames)
      Constructs a new AddOnClassLoader without dependencies on other add-ons. Possibly restricting or allowing the loading of the given addOnClassnames, directly from this AddOnClassLoader.
      Parameters:
      addOnFileUrl - the URL to the add-on file that will be (first) used to load classes and resources
      parent - the parent class loader for delegation and sharing of class loading lock(s).
      addOnClassnames - the classnames that can be loaded
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the addOnFileUrl or parent is null.
      Since:
      2.7.0

      dependencies - the AddOnClassLoaders of the dependencies of the add-on

    • findResourceInAddOn

      public URL findResourceInAddOn(String name)
      Finds the resource with the specified name (only) in the add-on file.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the resource
      Returns:
      a URL for the resource, or null if the resource could not be found, or if the loader is closed.
      Since:
      2.4.0
      See Also:
      • findResource(String)
